select cpi.id, comm_num, cpi.memb_id, cpi.sale_staff_id, cpi.stalls_mage_id, cpi.comm_id, cpi.comm_title, cpi.comm_variet_id,origin_place_type, cpi.abroad_id, comm_local_prov, comm_local_city, comm_local_cou,ser_type_expres, comm_signature,Recommend, notes_to_buy, comm_state_type, reject_reason,exam_id,comm_sale_set_id, css.comm_name as 'comm_sale_set_name',cvm.comm_variet_name, cpi.ser_support_type,cpi.storage_type,cpi.storage_id,cpi.plantation_id,cpi.base_id,cpi.port_id,goods_type,yjdf_flag, cpi.create_date as 'createDate',cpi.update_date as 'update_date',brand_mage_id, cp.url,cp.comm_picture_type,cp.sort,sm.business_date,sm.business_time,sm.contacts,sm.cont_tel, sm.address,sm.whole_sale_market_id,sm.shop_id,si.shop_name,sm.stalls_name,sm.stalls_house_num,sm.back_ground_url, ca.comm_attri_column as 'commAttriColumn',ca.comm_attri_name as "commAttriName",ca.comm_attri_type as "commAttriType", lsq.id as "commLevelSpecId",lsq.avai_supply_count as 'lsqAvaiCount',lsq.meas_unit_id as 'measUnitId',lsq.start_ord_expres, lsq.spec as 'spec', lsq.net_weight as 'netWeight',lsq.price_expres,lsq.transaction_amount,lsq.sales_volume, ca.comm_attri_val as "commAttriVal",ca.if_requ as 'ifRequ',ca.sort as 'commAttriSort',ca.length as 'length', ca.dict_val as 'dictVal',ca.comm_attri_id as 'commAttriId',bm.brand_name,bi.base_name,bp.url as 'base_url',sti.storage_name,pi.plantation_name,pm.port_name, pm.area_prov
,fc.id as 'followCommPubId' ,fm.id as 'follow_merchant_id'
from comm_pub_info cpi LEFT JOIN comm_sale_set css ON css.id = cpi.comm_sale_set_id LEFT JOIN comm_variet_mage cvm ON cvm.id = cpi.comm_variet_id LEFT JOIN comm_attri ca ON ca.comm_pub_id = cpi.id LEFT JOIN comm_picture cp ON cp.comm_pub_id = cpi.id LEFT JOIN brand_mage bm ON bm.id = cpi.brand_mage_id LEFT JOIN stalls_mage sm ON sm.id = cpi.stalls_mage_id LEFT JOIN shop_info si ON si.id = sm.shop_id LEFT JOIN base_info bi ON bi.id = cpi.base_id LEFT JOIN base_picture bp ON bi.id = bp.base_id and bp.base_picture_type ='0' LEFT JOIN storage_info sti ON sti.id = cpi.storage_id LEFT JOIN plantation_info pi ON pi.id = cpi.plantation_id LEFT JOIN port_mage pm ON pm.id = cpi.port_id LEFT JOIN level_spec_quote lsq ON lsq.comm_pub_id = cpi.id and lsq.del_flag = '0'
LEFT JOIN follow_comm fc ON (fc.comm_pub_id = cpi.id AND fc.del_flag = '0' AND fc.memb_id = #{membId}) LEFT JOIN follow_merchant fm ON fm.shop_id = si.id and fm.del_flag = '0' and fm.memb_id = #{membId}
where cpi.id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and cpi.del_flag = '0' order by cp.sort asc

AND (instr(t1.comm_num,#{likeName}) != 0 OR instr(t1.comm_title,#{likeName})) != 0
AND INSTR(t1.comm_id,#{commId}) != 0
AND INSTR(ea.comp_name,#{entpName}) != 0)
AND INSTR(bi.base_name,#{baseName}) != 0)
AND INSTR(t1.comm_state_type,#{commStateType}) != 0
AND si.merchant_id IN
#{id}

#{id}
AND sm.whole_sale_market_id = #{marketId} AND t1.del_flag != '1' AND t1.comm_state_type != '3' AND t4.del_flag != '1' ORDER BY t1.update_date DESC
